shrimp.name: FWidth
shrimp.description: Determine correct sample size for antialiasing
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: fwidth
output.description: An estimate of the sample width at p

shrimp.usage: The filterwidth function takes a float, or point inputs, and returns the approximate amount that the float or point changes from pixel to adjacent pixel. It's used to filter frequencies that would otherwise produce aliasing.
